document.full_text: uganda will order social media sites twitter and facebook blocked locally if further protests over high food and fuel prices take place because they are being used to fan unrest, a senior official said tuesday.
document.title: uganda threatens to block social media over protests
lines_and_colors: uganda will order social media sites twitter and facebook blocked locally if further protests over high food and fuel prices take place because they are being used to fan unrest, a senior official said tuesday.
